scenes.background: You agreed to help with the urgent task. Monica and Bob are discussing.
scenes.description: I really appreciate you stepping in during your leave. But, Bob thinks we could have managed without bothering you.

options.text: It's fine, Monica. Let's focus on solving the issue at hand.
options.analysis: You prioritize addressing the task, showing good self-regulation and social skills, but empathy and perception could be stronger.

options.text: I don't mind helping, but Bob, please let me know if it can wait next time.
options.analysis: You express willingness to help while setting future boundaries, demonstrating empathy but lower in perception and motivation.

options.text: Bob, I understand your perspective, but sometimes extra help is necessary.
options.analysis: You acknowledge Bob's view while justifying your assistance, showing good perception and social skills, but could improve on self-regulation.
